<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Heir of the Saoc](/Feats.aspx?ID=954) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 14 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Saoc Astrology](/Feats.aspx?ID=946)

</column>

---

In the past, you would have been a proud initiate of the Saoc Brethren. Today, you carry on their legacy. When you use Saoc Astrology, roll 1d4 instead; on a 1, you take a –1 penalty to the skill check. On any other result, you gain a circumstance bonus of that value (for instance, a +3 circumstance bonus on a 3).
name: Heir of the Saoc
